items.name: Mosh
items.description: Super kind. All the other Gogo's want to be friends with Mosh

items.name: Nasako
items.description: Always cool because he has a special scoring technique

items.name: Sato
items.description: Ready for the fight. Where's the ring?

items.name: Okori
items.description: Nobody knows what he eats, but whatever it is, it isn't doing hime any good

items.name: Tori
items.description: Clever and fun. He likes to be the boss

items.name: Helly
items.description: The fastest Gogo. His helmet helps him to go breathtakingly fast

items.name: Skull
items.description: He looks mysterioius and when you least expect it he'll do something funny to make you jump.

items.name: Angiru
items.description: Tell Angiru your secrets and they will be safe forever

items.name: Umu
items.description: Likes to visit the swimming pool every day to think up new ideas

items.name: Aiko
items.description: The Gogo with the best sense of smell. Can detect a smell from a mile away

items.name: Ichiro
items.description: Don't stare into his eyes. You'll be overcome by his great mental power

items.name: Nuclos
items.description: Absorbs pollution and leaves the air really clean.

items.name: Boy
items.description: The best blindfolded runner. He never falls over

items.name: Neko
items.description: Uses its body to protect the other Gogo's from fire

items.name: Hazard
items.description: When faced with danger, it just grits its teeth and carries on.

items.name: Sun
items.description: Fires a ray of optimism at every Gogo in its path

items.name: Hiro
items.description: Solves problems with electrifying 500W ideas

items.name: Aka
items.description: Can collide with 100 Gogo's without getting any bumps or bruises

items.name: Molly
items.description: Getting angry is no problem - because it lasts less than 1 second!

items.name: Nari
items.description: Don't try and stare out Nari - you will lose.

items.name: Simi
items.description: Smiling charges up his powers. He smiles and then shoots away

items.name: Codi
items.description: Always connected. Ask it anything and the data will be downloaded

items.name: Hiraku
items.description: The most daring pirate - endless adventures

items.name: Rufus
items.description: Sees things the other Gogo's can't using the powers of planet X

items.name: Temp
items.description: Is the water really cold? What time is it going to rain? Just ask Temp

items.name: Pibi
items.description: Organises ideas in both sides of its head. Need ideas, speak to Pibi

items.name: Dare
items.description: The best looking Gogo. He always looks his best

items.name: Danko
items.description: Feline, fast, agile and well behaved

items.name: Mc Toy
items.description: Always careful and questioning. Never makes a wrong move

items.name: Gaiji
items.description: Takes control of the situation. An expert in crowd control

items.name: Lessi
items.description: Sometimes feels a little low, you might need to perk him up

items.name: Pop
items.description: Loves music and dances non-stop

items.name: DJ-Imon
items.description: Absorbs ideas through its star

items.name: Jelly
items.description: Brave enough for any battle

items.name: Sumon
items.description: Traps his enemies inside his huge powerful jaws

items.name: Cho
items.description: Races ahead at full speed and that's why he doesn't have any teeth left

items.name: Raysun
items.description: Has a great time bringing sunshine into the Gogo's world

items.name: Fist
items.description: Holds a secret strength inside his fist

items.name: Zar-Zar
items.description: Pretends not to understand but knows much more than you think..

items.name: Hayato
items.description: Wants 20 mirrors nearby to keep an eye on everything

items.name: Bigu
items.description: Stands tall and upright. Gives fun orders to the troops

items.name: Ojaru
items.description: Badly sewn together but strong enough to hold the secret of flight

items.name: Speed
items.description: Turns his head with supersonic speed and always sees the world around him

items.name: Tremi
items.description: Appearances can be deceptive. Not as grumpy as he looks

items.name: B-Boy
items.description: Eats a lot of popcorn to improve bouncing power

items.name: Mochi
items.description: A lucky charm amongst the Gogo's family

items.name: Popus
items.description: Digs long tunnels to move around without anyone knowing he is there

items.name: Tube
items.description: Thanks to gramophone-ears, it hears everything and can play it all back

items.name: Cubic
items.description: A robot Gogo who is an expert mechanic

items.name: B-King
items.description: When he sits down to think, he acts like a tribal chief

items.name: Croc
items.description: Croc is a chequered crocodile. In other words, a crocodile chess master

items.name: Ufus
items.description: With its rubber ninja body, it can fly long distances between bounces

items.name: Egbot
items.description: Communicates through waves, thanks to its electromagnetic mouth

items.name: H-83
items.description: A strong shell makes it super resistant

items.name: Atori
items.description: Keeps all his knowledge safe inside and then closes the zip

items.name: B-Ball
items.description: If the sport has a ball, he is the master

items.name: Usuzi
items.description: If something goes wrong, he is very nervous until a solution is found

items.name: Eco
items.description: Can travel over any obstacle or difficult terrain using four arms

items.name: Oh!
items.description: Loves to surprise all the other Gogo's

items.name: Alkaline
items.description: Ultra-turbo power. Mega max - Full blast energy

items.name: Awa-Shima
items.description: Always ready for action, but don't bother him for anything else

items.name: Ghost
items.description: Dark mystery. Not everyone dares look him in the face

items.name: Tut
items.description: The curious Mummy. Can remove a tiny bit of bandage to see what's going on

items.name: Matsue
items.description: Very proud of his super cool hair cut

items.name: Akita
items.description: Friend and loyal companion. You can count on Akita

items.name: Shizuoka
items.description: With just one cry, he can get all the Gogo's attention

items.name: Miyake
items.description: Cuts through the water at amazing speed

items.name: Fujichick
items.description: Flies fast and high, but lands soft and smooth

items.name: Tsu
items.description: Juices, cold drinks, he always has a drink handy. A thirsty Gogo.

items.name: Kokubu
items.description: The life and soul of any party. Invited to every occasion

items.name: Izumi
items.description: Loves speed and never gets off his motorbike

items.name: Ako
items.description: The ultimate minder. 50 special moves ready to go

items.name: Kami-Kami
items.description: Brushes his teeth before playing any game. Always fresh and minty

items.name: Sago
items.description: Changes shape to fit into any space.

items.name: Vampa
items.description: Not seen much during the day. He moves in the dark

items.name: Misha
items.description: Cute and cuddly, the best sleeping companion around

items.name: Yuza
items.description: As strong as a rock. Arms like granite

items.name: Tan Chia
items.description: Wants to be the Gogo's hero. Always ready for action

items.name: Kolo
items.description: Futuristic Gogo who loves technology. Floats through space guided by the stars.

items.name: Evi
items.description: Although it tries to frighten its friends, it makes them laugh more than anything

items.name: Angiru MW
items.description: Tell Angiru your secrets and they will be safe forever

items.name: Ichiro MW
items.description: Don't stare into his eyes. You'll be overcome by his great mental power

items.name: Hiraku MW
items.description: The most daring pirate - endless adventures

items.name: B-Boy MW
items.description: Eats a lot of popcorn to improve bouncing power

items.name: Fist MW
items.description: Holds a secret strength inside his fist

items.name: Skull W
items.description: He looks mysterioius and when you least expect it he'll do something funny to make you jump.

items.name: Hazard W
items.description: When faced with danger, it just grits its teeth and carries on.

items.name: Codi W
items.description: Always connected. Ask it anything and the data will be downloaded

items.name: Mc Toy W
items.description: Always careful and questioning. Never makes a wrong move

items.name: Cho W
items.description: Races ahead at full speed and that's why he doesn't have any teeth left

items.name: Tremi W
items.description: Appearances can be deceptive. Not as grumpy as he looks

items.name: Tube W
items.description: Thanks to gramophone-ears, it hears everything and can play it all back

items.name: Ufus W
items.description: With its rubber ninja body, it can fly long distances between bounces

items.name: Egbot W
items.description: Communicates through waves, thanks to its electromagnetic mouth

items.name: Atori W
items.description: Keeps all his knowledge safe inside and then closes the zip

items.name: Usuzi W
items.description: If something goes wrong, he is very nervous until a solution is found

items.name: Oh! W
items.description: Loves to surprise all the other Gogo's

items.name: Awa-Shima W
items.description: Always ready for action, but don't bother him for anything else

items.name: Tut W
items.description: The curious Mummy. Can remove a tiny bit of bandage to see what's going on

items.name: Kokubu W
items.description: The life and soul of any party. Invited to every occasion

items.name: Moshi
items.description: Avoids confrontation. Always brings goodness and peace.

items.name: Nasoki
items.description: Tries to make everyone laugh. Sometimes his looks scare the others a little bit!

items.name: Satori
items.description: Always watchful in case action is needed.

items.name: Oky
items.description: Maybe some indigestion gave him a mushroom face.

items.name: Racetor
items.description: He loves sports and can calculate how to win any race.

items.name: Heled
items.description: He robotized his brain to think super fast.

items.name: Sker
items.description: He's naive and everything seems weird to him.

items.name: Angor
items.description: Night misteries are no secret to Angor.

items.name: Tai-Umu
items.description: With the points of his mouth-star he chews the hardest things.

items.name: Koku-Chan
items.description: He must go to the barber everyday because his hair grows while he plays.

items.name: Chiru
items.description: The moon reflects in his eyes when he's sleepy.

items.name: Nuchan
items.description: Serious and thoughtful. He looks like the chief Gogo.

items.name: Om-Poh
items.description: Uses spells to play better. Sometimes it works.

items.name: Nebub
items.description: Concentrates the water supply to put out any fire.

items.name: Hazer
items.description: His game style is funny and he goes crazy watching others play.

items.name: Sunon
items.description: Ticklish all over his body. Nobody can even stand close to him.

items.name: Hiroki
items.description: Never afraid of new games. Always on the front line.

items.name: Akone
items.description: The masters made him into a Kung Fu hero.

items.name: Sully
items.description: The energy of the stars is always with him...or so he says.

items.name: Narion
items.description: He shows himself in darkness thanks to his luminiscent glasses.

items.name: Simsei
items.description: His mouth is a freezer but he's always shivering.

items.name: Doki
items.description: He has an incredibly sweet tooth. When he's not playing he's hunting for sweets.

items.name: Hirchan
items.description: No hook and no eye patch but this pirate is still sailing the high seas.

items.name: Rufistar
items.description: He's the main attraction at any party. Creates fun for everyone.

items.name: Temsei
items.description: He's a real handyman. He can fix anything... except his own shoelaces!

items.name: Pilhy
items.description: He's got a positive pole, a negative pole and he's fully charged.

items.name: Doro
items.description: Restless and playful. He gets nervous when nobody plays.

items.name: Danoki
items.description: Loves to lurk around corners and hide from others.

items.name: Mc-Mask
items.description: His head is always in the clouds. He's a dreamer.

items.name: Gaisor
items.description: Firm and fair. He likes to be in command of every situation.

items.name: Lessei
items.description: Moves his head to the rhythm of any music.

items.name: Popo
items.description: Doesn't like too many bumps but with his lucky star he is a very skilful player.

items.name: Imooki
items.description: A voice in his earphones tells him the rules of every game. He's got such a terrible memory.

items.name: Jezo
items.description: A long losing streak has made this once confident Gogo suddenly very modest.

items.name: Sumi
items.description: Full of encouragement. Sumi welcomes everyone with open arms.

items.name: Shoon
items.description: Evolution has made him safety conscious. He likes to slow everyone down.

items.name: Sunok
items.description: Optimist, happy and calm. Everything in his life is absolutely OK.

items.name: Fizer
items.description: Always ready to get the games started.

items.name: Gar-Gar
items.description: Founder of the Gogo's Aerospace Association. Always searching for new horizons.

items.name: Hayori
items.description: Evolution hasn't changed her vanity. Her hair must always be perfect.

items.name: Migu
items.description: The tough guy in the troop. He can throw a Gogo higher than anyone else.

items.name: Jitty
items.description: Keeps himself cool by flapping his big ears.

items.name: Velop
items.description: He can measure his speed and that of any approaching Gogo.

items.name: Trike
items.description: Very happy with his evolution. He has great pride in himself.

items.name: Boki
items.description: A big tummy and a big appetite. This is one Gogo who is always on time for a meal.

items.name: Chimu
items.description: Never afraid to get hurt. This is one Gogo who is ready for any daring challenge.

items.name: Duop
items.description: A real split personality. You'd better be careful with how much you trust him.

items.name: Tubor
items.description: Always alert and always aware. His senses are even higher when he sleeps.

items.name: Cupix
items.description: Uses his screen-face to play Gogo-games with his friends.

items.name: B-Kori
items.description: He's so friendly that his horns don't scare anybody.

items.name: Crooki
items.description: An electric shock has left him fully charged.

items.name: Fuso
items.description: A wild dancer. He makes moves that others couldn't even imagine.

items.name: Egor
items.description: The hungriest Gogo of all. Keeps his mouth wide open for instant snacking.

items.name: Tari
items.description: Never play hide and seek with Taki. He wins every time.

items.name: E-Flo
items.description: This Gogo loves nature, wildlife and outdoor adventures.

items.name: Balu
items.description: He's fascinated with head-to-head challenges. A real thrill seeker.

items.name: Yonozi
items.description: Likes to get everything arranged in perfect order. Every detail is double checked.

items.name: Eken
items.description: He's got a anti-bump position which makes him extra hard to tumble down.

items.name: Kalin
items.description: An important Gogo who carries news and information to the others.

items.name: Kingo
items.description: A body that looks like a face, a face that looks like a body... some Gogo's don't know what to make of him.

items.name: Fawa
items.description: The official photographer. Always ready to capture a key moment.

items.name: Fantu
items.description: When it's time for him to play, he's so happy that his eye starts dancing.

items.name: Tucor
items.description: A sore loser but really he has a kind heart.

items.name: Sut
items.description: Sometimes he walks like a zombie. Sleeping problems maybe?

items.name: Taki
items.description: Covers his eyes to train his sense of smell, he's always right!

items.name: Skimy
items.description: He just wants to play games all day long. Never too tired to play.

items.name: Kam
items.description: Obsessed with his music. Talk loudly if you want his attention.

items.name: Flick
items.description: It's impossible to knock him down if you look straight into his eyes.

items.name: Sip
items.description: Looks like he has bad eyesight but his aim is perfect every time.

items.name: Triku
items.description: Pays good attention to the game... from the front, left and right.

items.name: Mizu
items.description: Locks the target with his eyes and fires straight down the middle.

items.name: Vatco
items.description: Wants to eat something... but doesn't know what.

items.name: Maka
items.description: A true individual. Happy with his unusual looks.

items.name: Femo
items.description: He can't wait to join GAR-GAR's Aerospace Association

items.name: Cruser
items.description: Performs great magic tricks, even though he can't hide anything!

items.name: Misori
items.description: Lacking in confidence but always plays better than expected.

items.name: Zuy
items.description: He thinks that he'll win every game... unfortunately, he suffers a lot of disappointment.

items.name: Tin-Chu
items.description: Always proposing some foul play. Loves wrestling.

items.name: Snok
items.description: Spends long hours under water. Everybody goes crazy looking for him.

items.name: Kivu
items.description: Carefully concentrates his thoughts before any attack.

items.name: Miro-K
items.description: An expert survivalist and noble ancient, Miro-K's masked visage beams wisdom and strength. One of the few remaining ancient Gogo's, he has re-emerged to unite all the Gogo clans.

items.name: Flamer
items.description: Keeps the other Gogos warm, even in the coldest places.

items.name: Eydo
items.description: Hides amongst the shadows and discovers secret places.

items.name: Tivi
items.description: King of the Virtual World – can master a whole load of videogames.

items.name: Xar
items.description: Goes under water and has the fish laughing their heads off.

items.name: Raylo
items.description: Can find its way around, even if it's pouring with rain.

items.name: Tork
items.description: Speed and urban sports are its thing. Rollers, skateboards and bikes.

items.name: Birtu
items.description: Always dreaming up in the trees with the birds, letting its imagination fly.

items.name: Mo
items.description: Never stops eating, but always keeps fit : Joins every expedition!

items.name: Zhip
items.description: Has the ability to open just about anything. A popular companion on Gogo expeditions.

items.name: Onikaso
items.description: Never agrees with the routes Eitor proposes, but always tags along.

items.name: Fanbon
items.description: Likes to appear suddenly in the most unexpected places, like a ghost.

items.name: Jampa Jampa
items.description: Chooses upward paths, so that it can jump along the route.

items.name: Lunino
items.description: Gets its bearings easily as it has one eye on each side. That's a real advantage!

items.name: Kato
items.description: Always seems to pick the best routes. A leader for many Gogo's.

items.name: Boox
items.description: Specialises in river crossings, but has also crossed deserts. Wow!

items.name: Saileen
items.description: Dreams that it is a drop of water that has evaporated and is floating among the clouds.

items.name: Harty
items.description: Its heart beats each time it discovers a new place.

items.name: Jaha
items.description: Gets lost a hundred times, but is always in a good mood.

items.name: Shebot
items.description: Thanks to its special suit, it can go into really hot caves.

items.name: Offon
items.description: Doesn't rest or stop, just keeps on going.

items.name: Solfer
items.description: It makes up a song every time it visits a new place.

items.name: Mechi
items.description: Very laid back and a good handyman; able to repair everything.

items.name: Enko
items.description: If it doesn't want to be seen, it takes off its glasses and wears a mask.

items.name: Mr. Capi
items.description: If there's a new place to explore, it's the first to step forward.

items.name: Amy Nicai
items.description: Closes its eyes slowly and floats away in a dream.

items.name: Losty
items.description: Never remembers the way it came, and has to look for the return route.

items.name: RC-K8
items.description: Slides along really fast, and when it comes across an obstacle, it has to stop and use its aerial drive.

items.name: Zabrisky
items.description: Has been travelling for a long time, particularly by train and knows all the routes.

items.name: Oibel
items.description: Different to all the others, it always travels by car and always arrives on time.

items.name: Switel
items.description: Often loses the group and has to shout loudly to find them.

items.name: Scamy
items.description: Spends so much time in the water, that when it comes out, it has to shout “Wait for me!”

items.name: Tar-Tar
items.description: Tries to avoid danger so that it can keep on going and travel far.

items.name: Flycat
items.description: Butterfly wizard. The butterflies guide it to some amazing places.

items.name: Fishino
items.description: Loves fish, but hates putting its feet in water...even when wearing boots!

items.name: Sarp
items.description: Silent and solitary. Accompanies the others, even though they can hardly see it.

items.name: Lasly
items.description: Loves the small details in every place.

items.name: Lups
items.description: Runs around everywhere. Is really fast and can sniff out even the most difficult track to follow.

items.name: Dumdum
items.description: Likes to be the biggest Gogo, so that it can take giant strides.

items.name: Giro
items.description: Although it flies, it loves leaving footprints everywhere it goes.

items.name: Artix
items.description: Travels to art museums and plays standing statues so that visitors look at it.

items.name: Uzzle
items.description: Fits in everywhere and is missed when it's not around.

items.name: Gor
items.description: Big and strong, but its slippery body can slip through small spaces.

items.name: Starfu
items.description: Although it's scared of exploring in the dark, it can see better at night.

items.name: Lampetti
items.description: Long-lasting and low consumption light: the ideal companion for inspecting dark places.

items.name: Chenko
items.description: Walks firmly and steadily, at a good pace.

items.name: Eitor
items.description: Remembers thousands of places, but finds it hard to locate them.

items.name: Moky
items.description: Likes to play jokes on others, but doesn't go too far.

items.name: Hilbo
items.description: Always advises his friends to have a good breakfast before setting out to explore.

items.name: Din-Awa
items.description: Is always excited, wherever it goes.

items.name: Chatt
items.description: Doesn't stop talking the whole way. Some Gogos complain, but nobody gets bored.

items.name: Clappy
items.description: Wants to touch everything, and when it reaches a new place, it starts to clap.

items.name: Lucky Rab
items.description: Maybe its just luck, but this Gogo never has any problems and everything always goes well.

items.name: Whas
items.description: Advises other Gogos when there is any danger or when it sees something interesting to explore.

items.name: Kichi
items.description: Loves sweets. If it finds one, it forgets about everything else.

items.name: Starboro
items.description: Can be seen easily from many places, and can be followed from far away.

items.name: Zatocat
items.description: Has a special sense for detecting any dangers ahead.

items.name: Mori
items.description: Very strong when seated, and has already saved several Gogos from trouble!

items.name: Yimo
items.description: Loves finding places where it can rest quietly.

items.name: Ufor
items.description: Nobody knows where it comes from, but it is always keen to join every adventure.

items.name: Comco
items.description: One of Tivi's good friends. They spend the whole day playing together.

items.name: Doc Spavilander
items.description: After years of searching, it has found its favourite exploration site: the laboratory.

items.name: Targy
items.description: Likes to get to the front of the queue and give the other Gogos something to aim for.

items.name: Champer
items.description: Loves getting lost in the corners of the forest.

items.name: Block
items.description: If Eitor sends it correct information, it can find anything straight away.

items.name: Jowa
items.description: Very caring. Popular with everyone.

items.name: Divel
items.description: Bit of an urban hooligan. Even better at skating than Tork.

items.name: Doot
items.description: Always goes to the most curious and amazing places.

items.name: Numbar
items.description: Has an exploration code that hardly anyone can break.

items.name: Jato
items.description: If the route is a straight line, this Gogo is the best.

items.name: Wolo
items.description: A little bit strange, because although it gets seasick, it loves travelling by boat.

items.name: Linjat
items.description: Loves climbing and finds flat ground really boring.

items.name: Vladisfor
items.description: Has more experience than Zabrisky and is cleverer than Doc Spavilander, but specialises in growing vegetables.

items.name: Mobot
items.description: Very well preserved robot that also does gymnastics.

items.name: Yucan
items.description: Seems incredible, but many Gogos don't know if it has three eyes or one.

items.name: Dori Midori
items.description: Touches its tummy to memorise a place so that it can find it again later.

items.name: Gondo
items.description: By whistling and orientating its sensitive ears, it can sense if there is any water nearby.

items.name: Min
items.description: Can hypnotise a Gogo to stop it from feeling scared and to give it more energy.

items.name: Ghostmander
items.description: Concentrates a lot and is very quiet. If it ever says anything, everyone listens, because it is always right.

items.name: Plux
items.description: Sometimes it can't decide, but shouts “forward” with its small mouth.

items.name: Winflag
items.description: Loves fast machines, like motorbikes, cars or motor boats.

items.name: Orro
items.description: Keep a close eye on every rush hour with his eagle eyes. Calculates the speed and trajectory of a ball in a millisecond.

items.name: Cyro
items.description: mainstay of keeper Orro. Forms an impenetrable block and protect the goal against the most insidious penalties

items.name: Pallis
items.description: As a born leader. Strict and demanding of his teammates. Executes the performance of his team to great heights.

items.name: Ganaz
items.description: Heartwarming attacker. Often runs to the public as if everyone wants his arms close .

items.name: Barru
items.description: A former rugby player and football legend. His nickname is "The Pickpocket". He makes everybody the ball stealing.

items.name: Bombo
items.description: Football fanatic. Not miss a game. Profit or loss: he makes all the fans excited.

items.name: Silba
items.description: Creates a party of any race. Flute cheerful and honest.

items.name: Bala
items.description: Ball with special effects. If he gets a kick, he goes in all directions except the side that the opponent expects.

items.name: Gaw
items.description: a nuisance by some players. Yet his yelling gets the best out of each player.

items.name: Lin
items.description: See more quickly than other hazardous activities during the match and warned his team before.

items.name: Bhau
items.description: An angry eyes and a face of thunder is. He hunts every rush the fright.

items.name: Raus
items.description: A wall of a player. Uses his body to throw players in the field. Only very brave opponents a chance.

items.name: Fro-Zen
items.description: His inspired leadership creates a determined and focused team .

items.name: Dyn
items.description: Elusive attacker. Passes unnoticed every defender. Moves so fast that her hair on fire.

items.name: Kiquen
items.description: Habitually to suspend play for hours by the ball high. To the annoyance of the opponent.

items.name: Buck
items.description: Could the outcome of a game may affect by focusing on the outcome.

items.name: Forf
items.description: Hank and confident. Speak to him and you get a yellow card or worse ...

items.name: Dowah
items.description: Can themselves into multiple, smaller balls. This makes almost every keeper no chance.

items.name: Milar
items.description: Looks like an absent-minded scientist. Creates impressive team setups. One "problem": nobody understands.

items.name: Lyu
items.description: The symbol of perseverance and determination .

items.name: Ribas
items.description: Jumps on top of the ball, as if springs in his shoes down.
